{{Wireless embedded system |brand=KZTECH |model=iSurf 1000 |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=05/11/2012 |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |type=wireless router,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=A28ISURF1000A1 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}
*The default SSID may follow the pattern of '''KZTECH-XXXXXX'''. Default credentials may be user:user@172.16.1.1 or admin:admin@172.168.0.1 . :The device appears to use [[Ralink]] RT3052.
